data.name: Solitaire Bonbon
data.detailed_description:
Immerse yourself in the unforgettable atmosphere of the sweet world! Cook lots of sweets and enjoy it!
The time has come to unwind with the sweetest adventure you've ever been on!

Explore 20 locations and get tasty trophies. Levels of varying complexity provide several hours of exciting gameplay every day, and special Golden Cards add an extra layer of fun.

- Let your emotions run wild!
- Solitaire card game – collect chains of cards!
- Never a dull moment with super exciting levels!
- Vivid graphics and a Pirate soundtrack make this Solitaire a win-win!
- Get rid of cards faster with jokers, and increase the combo multiplier to earn more coins!
- Get 15 delicious items!
- Original themed decks and 12 card back styles!
- Let the fun take over!

data.short_description: Cook lots of sweets and enjoy it! 200 levels in the sweet world theme!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 or later
  • Processor: 1500 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2000 MHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
